languages.text: {n}Вам стоит невероятных усилий оставаться в сознании, хотя тело действует против вашей воли. Вы понимаете, как тянетесь за оружием. Моргаете — и уже держите его перед собой. Затем моргаете снова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вам стоит невероятных усилий оставаться в сознании, хотя тело действует против вашей воли. Вы понимаете, как тянетесь за оружием. Моргаете — и уже держите его перед собой. Затем моргаете снова.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам стоит невероятных усилий оставаться в сознании, хотя тело действует против вашей воли. Вы понимаете, как тянетесь за оружием. Моргаете — и уже держите его перед собой. Затем моргаете снова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realize you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

{n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realize you are reaching for your weapon. You blink, and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

{n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realize you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

{n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

{n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

languages.text: {n}自分の意志に反して体が動いているにもかかわらず、意識を保つには信じられないほどの努力が必要だった。あなたは自分が武器に手を伸ばしていることに気づく。まばたきすると、武器が手の中にあった。あなたはもう一度まばたきをする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}自分の意志に反して体が動いているにもかかわらず、意識を保つには信じられないほどの努力が必要だった。あなたは自分が武器に手を伸ばしていることに気づく。まばたきすると、武器が手の中にあった。あなたはもう一度まばたきをする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Necesitas un esfuerzo increíble para no perder el conocimiento aunque tu cuerpo se rebela contra ti. Te das cuenta de que te dispones a preparar tu arma. Parpadeas y la tienes en la mano. Parpadeas otra vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Necesitas un esfuerzo increíble para no perder el conocimiento aunque tu cuerpo se rebela contra ti. Te das cuenta de que te dispones a preparar tu arma. Parpadeas y la tienes en la mano. Parpadeas otra vez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你用尽力气才勉强维持清醒，但你的身体仍然不听使唤。你意识到你的身体在摸索武器。你眨了眨眼，看到武器就在手中。你又眨了眨眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你用尽力气才勉强维持清醒，但你的身体仍然不听使唤。你意识到你的身体在摸索武器。你眨了眨眼，看到武器就在手中。你又眨了眨眼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous devez faire appel à toute votre volonté pour ne pas sombrer dans l'inconscience, alors que votre propre corps s'oppose à vous. Vous réalisez que vous êtes en train de dégainer votre arme. Lorsque vous clignez des yeux, elle est dans vos mains. Vous clignez des yeux une nouvelle fois.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous devez faire appel à toute votre volonté pour ne pas sombrer dans l'inconscience, alors que votre propre corps s'oppose à vous. Vous réalisez que vous êtes en train de dégainer votre arme. Lorsque vous clignez des yeux, elle est dans vos mains. Vous clignez des yeux une nouvelle fois.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist eine unvorstellbare Anstrengung nötig, damit du nicht das Bewusstsein verlierst, obwohl dein Körper gegen deinen Willen handelt. Dir wird klar, dass du nach deiner Waffe greifst. Du blinzelst und siehst sie in deiner Hand. Dann blinzelst du erneut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist eine unvorstellbare Anstrengung nötig, damit du nicht das Bewusstsein verlierst, obwohl dein Körper gegen deinen Willen handelt. Dir wird klar, dass du nach deiner Waffe greifst. Du blinzelst und siehst sie in deiner Hand. Dann blinzelst du erneut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bilincini yitirmemek için inanılmaz bir efor sarf ediyorsun... Bedenin, iradene itaat etmiyor. Elini silahına götürdüğünü fark ediyorsun. Gözünü kırpınca silahını elinde görüyorsun. Ardından yine göz kırpıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It takes an incredible effort to remain conscious, even though your body is acting against your will. You realise you are reaching for your weapon. You blink and see it in your hand. Then you blink again.{/n}
